cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world

Class ItemsLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.ItemsLoader

  • public class ItemsLoader
extends Object
    Class that loads items from items.data inside the working directory. Class loads them and stores them inside ItemsBase.
    Author:
    kocur

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        private void loadFile(String path)
               throws FileNotFoundException
        Loads the file and initializes the scanner that we use for reading the input.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file that should be loaded.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the file is not found on the path supplied in constructor.

      • loadItems

        public void loadItems(String path)
               throws FileNotFoundException,
                      LoadingError
        Loads items from file on specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - Path leading to items file.
        Throws:
        LoadingError - Throws LoadingError if there was an error with input (badly specified item).
        FileNotFoundException - If file was not found.

      • loadItem

        private void loadItem(String line)
               throws LoadingError
        Loads item from line and stores it inside ItemsBase.
        Parameters:
        line - Line that contains the item and that should be parsed.
        Throws:
        LoadingError - Thrown if input data weren't in correct state.
